net.kuujo.vertigo.rpc

Interface ExecuteQueue

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicExecuteQueue

    public interface ExecuteQueue
    An executor queue. An execute queue underlies each executor implementation. It maintains, in memory, a record of messages currently in transit from the current feeder, and assists in notifying the correct handler once a message result has been received.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman
